div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2281 Tunisia, 1928 (1139) Burial: 238 B.C. Contents: 39 AE Carthage: 21 unc. mint (as SNGCop. 226) 17 Libyan mint (as SNGCop. 244 [12]; 235 [2]; 233 [3]) 1 Sardinian mint (as SNGCop. 246) Disposition: London 15, Copenhagen 5 (SNG 226-30 "Tripoli hoard") Robinson, NC 1943, p. 6 Said to have been found at Tripoli, Libya, but really from Tunis (E.S.G.R.)
